desc: Trendy Tails dog grooming ! Independently owned & operated, lead by a qualified & dedicated professional. Your pup will be pampered in a warm hydro bath and dried with stress minimised during their individualised session. Their needs are attended within your budget, in a mobile, friendly & relaxed environment.

layout.text: At Trendy Tails mobile dog groomers, we dedicate ourselves to giving your fur babies the most fun and loving pamper experience, in a friendly, professional and relaxed environment. Your pampered pooch will leave feeling relaxed, fresh, clean and smelling great.
